A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I had fun while I was watching the film except for the Luke ending and Snoke Ending. 
After the movie when the Euphoria of seeing a star wars film wore off\, the more I thought about it\, the more I got pissed because the movie didn't make any sense. Luke was disrespected\, Rian Johnson crapped on every story element TFA set up.

Because these directors/writers are making this shit up as they go along\, I have no desire to see Episode 9 and see whate JJ Abrams retcons randomly because you can change anything you don't like from movie and movie and the movie having almost no connection to each other.
